sections.summary:
Food service worker with fast food, retail and customer service experience. Trained in food safety and handling. Also have some Sales
Representative Skills.
Highlights
Reliable and punctual
Reliable team worker
fast learner
Cash handling
self-motivated
Comfortable standing for long time periods
able to work in fast-paced environment
Math and language skills
able to count daily bank deposit
Conversant in Spanish
able to stay busy and focused while on the job
Restaurant management
Excellent multi-tasker
